sentences.english: In Touch apparently has become the Official Chronicler of American Bedding.

sentences.english: Every mouldering stone was a chronicle.
sentences.chinese: 每塊崩碎剝落的石頭都是一部編年史。

sentences.english: Chronicle difficult to focus on a one surname, which is Shisuo Chang Chi Chuan.
sentences.chinese: 編年史很難突出一家一姓，而這正是紀傳史所長。

sentences.english: Well a new share this is really freak, tombs for freya chronicle.
